text: Marian Fuks (born 28 September 1914) is a Polish historian specializing in the history of Polish Jews in Warsaw. He was director of the Jewish Historical Institute in the years 1968-1969 and 1971-1973.Żydowski Instytut Historyczny w Polsce (ŻIH) ==References== ==External links== *A MEETING WITH PROF.
